LoginPage.description: This page is the Login page for the DemoQA website, allowing users to log in to the Book Store application.

elements.name: Username Input
elements.description: Input field for entering the username.

elements.name: Password Input
elements.description: Input field for entering the password.

elements.name: Login Button
elements.description: Button to submit the login form.

DemoqaLoginPage.description: This page is the login page for the DemoQA bookstore application, where users can enter their credentials to access their accounts.

elements.name: Username Input
elements.description: Input field for entering the username.

elements.name: Password Input
elements.description: Input field for entering the password.

elements.name: Login Button
elements.description: Button to submit the login form.

elements.name: New User Button
elements.description: Button to navigate to the registration page for new users.

elements.name: Invalid username or password message
elements.description: Error message displayed when login fails.

ToolsqaBookStorePage.description: This page displays a list of books and allows users to search for books. It also provides links to other sections of the website.

elements.name: Search Box
elements.description: Input field to search for books.

elements.name: Search Button
elements.description: Button to initiate the book search.

elements.name: Login Button
elements.description: Button to navigate to the login page.

elements.name: Book Title Link
elements.description: Link to the book details page.

elements.name: Book Store Application Menu
elements.description: Menu item to access the Book Store Application section.

elements.name: Login Menu
elements.description: Menu item to navigate to the Login page.

assertions: At least one book title is displayed

UnknownPage.description: This page displays advertisement content at the bottom of the page.

elements.name: Advertisement 2
elements.primary_locator: //div[contains(text(),'8 Things That Make Any Man Crave')]

assertions: Verify that the advertisement section is displayed
Verify that the advertisement links are clickable
